MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY8 postcode area of Leven, affecting properties in Links Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs on an underground cable fault, we needed to carry out an emergency shutdown to remove the supplies to further properties. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.20pm on Wednesday 7th April 2021.
